features.name: MainApp
features.description: Root application component handling Firebase auth, presence tracking, route/view management (Login, Dashboard, VoicePrice), and global lifecycle

features.name: ChatPanel
features.description: Real-time chat panel displaying messages with special formatting for buy/sell/shipping events, pagination with Load More, and auto-scroll

features.name: StockGrid
features.description: Interactive stock inventory grid with search, filtering, sorting, quantity adjustment, and real-time Firebase sync

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard view composing StockGrid and ChatPanel side by side with responsive layout

features.name: Header
features.description: App header with navigation, TTS toggle (online/offline), away mode toggle, sound toggle, and user info display

features.name: HistoryModal
features.description: Modal for viewing transaction history with date filtering, search, CSV export, and summary statistics

features.name: LiveOverlay
features.description: Overlay component for live streaming display with latest transaction info

features.name: VoicePricePage
features.description: Voice-activated price checking page with speech recognition and TTS feedback

features.name: UpdatePrompt
features.description: PWA update prompt notifying users when a new version is available

features.name: ChatProcessor
features.description: Composable processing incoming chat messages, detecting buy/sell/shipping commands, updating stock, and triggering TTS

features.name: AudioManagement
features.description: Composable managing audio playback, sound effects, and TTS audio unlocking for iOS

features.name: VoiceDetector
features.description: Composable for speech recognition to detect voice commands for price queries

features.name: YouTubeIntegration
features.description: Composable for connecting to YouTube Live Chat API and streaming messages

features.name: OllamaAI
features.description: Composable for optional Ollama AI integration providing intelligent responses

features.name: GeminiAI
features.description: Composable for Google Gemini AI integration

features.name: HistoryManagement
features.description: Composable for fetching and managing transaction history from Firebase

features.name: AutoCleanup
features.description: Composable for automatic cleanup of old data from Firebase

features.name: AwayMode
features.description: Composable for away mode functionality that auto-responds when user is away

features.name: PullToRefresh
features.description: Composable implementing pull-to-refresh gesture for mobile/tablet devices

features.name: TextToSpeech
features.description: Service providing TTS capabilities with Google Cloud TTS (online) and native browser TTS (offline) modes

features.name: YouTubeLiveChat
features.description: Service for polling YouTube Live Chat API and fetching messages

features.name: StockStore
features.description: Pinia store managing stock inventory state with Firebase real-time sync

features.name: ChatStore
features.description: Pinia store managing chat messages with pagination and memory management

features.name: SystemStore
features.description: Pinia store for system-wide settings (sound, TTS mode, away mode, login state)

features.name: NicknameStore
features.description: Pinia store managing user nickname mappings from Firebase

features.name: Utilities
features.description: Utility modules for error handling, logging, and performance monitoring

features.name: Configuration
features.description: App constants and Firebase configuration

features.name: Styling
features.description: Global CSS styles and assets for the application
